mapper.select: select o.id, o.createtime, o.operation, o.method, o.params, o.ipaddress,u.user_name from operationlog o inner join sys_user u on u.user_id=o.userid order by createtime desc

select o.id, o.createtime, o.operation, o.method, o.params, o.ipaddress,u.user_name from operationlog o inner join sys_user u on u.user_id=o.userid where userid=#{operator,jdbcType=INTEGER} and createtime like #{time,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and operation like #{input,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by createtime desc

select o.id, o.createtime, o.operation, o.method, o.params, o.ipaddress,u.user_name from operationlog o inner join sys_user u on u.user_id=o.userid where userid=#{operator,jdbcType=INTEGER} and createtime like #{time,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by createtime desc

select o.id, o.createtime, o.operation, o.method, o.params, o.ipaddress,u.user_name from operationlog o inner join sys_user u on u.user_id=o.userid where createtime like #{time,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and operation like #{input,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by createtime desc

select o.id, o.createtime, o.operation, o.method, o.params, o.ipaddress,u.user_name from operationlog o inner join sys_user u on u.user_id=o.userid where user_id = #{operator,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by createtime desc

select o.id, o.createtime, o.operation, o.method, o.params, o.ipaddress,u.user_name from operationlog o inner join sys_user u on u.user_id=o.userid where userid like #{input,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by createtime desc
mapper.insert:
insert into operationlog
createtime,
`userid`,
`operation`,
`method`,
params,
ipaddress,
#{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{userId ,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{operation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{params,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{ipaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update operationlog
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
`userId ` = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
`operation` = #{operation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`method` = #{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
params = #{params,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ipaddress = #{ipaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update operationlog set createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, `userid` = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `operation` = #{operation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `method` = #{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, params = #{params,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ipaddress = #{ipaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
